title: Rengar rocks out with his cock out
body:
Rengar is my man and he always will be cause I'm straight. 

I don't understand why people are crying about him being under powered, he is still a very strong champion if used well. 

I think people play him, do very bad, have a sook and go back to using skillarina {{champion:55}} and call Rengar bad

But there is a few things that could be changed on Rengar

1) His ult 
He goes invisible right? Then a big yellow gay thing pops up on the person you're trying to gay in the ass

I think shorter range or none at all as ganks by Rengar can be countered with a well placed vision ward.  

2) His Necklace 
I think he should get more bonuses from kills, like, armor penetration, more damage, cool down reduction and attack speed on top of his normal bonuses. 

3) His Jungle is not so good unless you get early kills or build tanky 
Maybe to help with with his clear times give him a passive on his necklace or q that does more damage vs monsters or something gay like that.
His w does it why not his q 

Other than these small things Rengar is the best in my book and riot did a great job when creating him. When I play him you feel like a hunter. Every time I find a game and I click on Rengar and he says "Tonight We Hunt" I get a hard on.
